title: Google Camera constant background usage
content:
My Google Pixel 5 is having some battery drain issues while idle, its not so bad but my phone battery life was better when i first got it (2 weeks ago). The phone won't let me optimize the camera.

Could someone please advise what does this mean in the below snapshot.

Edit: i think it's related to the new Google Camera playstore update. After uninstalling it's gone.
